channel.title: Great Soul Train Robbery: A Fistful of Brimstone (GCOG One Shot)
channel.description: **Great Soul Train Robbery: A Fistful of Brimstone (GCOG One Shot)** A quartet of Desperados attempt to rob the train to Hell and steal back the deeds to their town. Will Griswald the blind drifter, Liza R. "Hellcat" the tomboy, Charlie "Wild Card" Carr the gambler, and Tzipporah Jenkins the revivalist claim their prize, or will Hell get its hooks into them first? https://youtu.be/j6MyJebakKE

item.title: Great Soul Train Robbery: A Fistful of Brimstone (GCOG One Shot)
item.dc:creator: @Alexi_Sarge
item.description:
@Alexi_Sarge wrote:

Great Soul Train Robbery: A Fistful of Brimstone (GCOG One Shot)
A quartet of Desperados attempt to rob the train to Hell and steal back the deeds to their town. Will Griswald the blind drifter, Liza R. “Hellcat” the tomboy, Charlie “Wild Card” Carr the gambler, and Tzipporah Jenkins the revivalist claim their prize, or will Hell get its hooks into them first?
